participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Emily loves exploring the outdoors and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I am 29 years old. I live in a suburb of Boston. I am a night owl. I enjoy hiking and riding my bicycle.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Jake finds joy in the virtual world and values the companionship of his pets.
participant_2.background: I am confined to my bed. I love when my pets visit me in bed. I enjoy playing computer games. I spend a good deal of time on social media.
